name: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new valid profanity string

testSteps.description: 1: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new valid profanity string ({text=this is awesome, format=json, profanity String=this,some, replacement char=, filtered text=**** is awe****})

children.description: When Siva requests a "this is awesome" after filtering using new "this,some" by replacing with "" character in "json"
Filter input text this is awesome by adding new text this,some by replacing  char in response format json

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: application/json
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
X-Cloud-Trace-Context: 00ee56a53c7fd063062684d3d3160f7a
Date: Sun, 18 Jul 2021 22:21:10 GMT
Server: Google Frontend
Content-Length: 28

children.description: Then he should be able to view the "**** is awe****" returned in requested "json"
Validate response 'result' **** is awe**** in format json

testSteps.description: 2: Filtering profanity for valid texts after adding new valid profanity string ({text=this is a test, format=xml, profanity String=a, replacement char=-, filtered text=this is - test})

children.description: When Siva requests a "this is a test" after filtering using new "a" by replacing with "-" character in "xml"
Filter input text this is a test by adding new text a by replacing - char in response format xml

children.description: Then he should be able to view the "this is - test" returned in requested "xml"
